scripts.transpile: yarn run transpile:moment && yarn run transpile:options
scripts.build: yarn run transpile && yarn run copy && web-ext build --source-dir=build --overwrite-dest
scripts.test: concurrently "yarn run copy:watch" "yarn run transpile:moment -- -w"  "yarn run transpile:options -- -w" "yarn run web-ext:run" --kill-others
scripts.test:fr: concurrently "yarn run copy:watch" "yarn run transpile:moment -- -w"  "yarn run transpile:options -- -w" "yarn run web-ext:run -- --pref intl.accept_languages=fr-fr" --kill-others
